# Loading the data 

To load data in, independently of the colonization scoring system, use the
follow command:

```{r loadData}
# Grid
gr <- readData("../inst/extdata/grid.csv") 
# Trouvelot
tr <- readData("../inst/extdata/trouvelot.csv") 

```

# Summarize data

```{r summary}
am_summary(gr)
am_summary(tr)
```

# Plot data

There are 2 plot types: 
- barplot
- boxplot

```{r plot}
am_barplot(gr)
# am_barplot(trs)
am_boxplot(gr)
# am_boxplot(trs)
```
